ResearchProjectDef.label: portals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of a portal - a powerful artifact that enables instant travel between colonies.\n\nRequires an Arcane Mage trained in Gateways to activate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: enchanting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables construction of the gemcutting bench and the crafting of tier I enchanting gems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced enchanting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables crafting to tier II enchanting gems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: expert enchanting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables crafting of tier III enchanting gems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: magicyte refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows gemcrafters to grind magicyte down into a powdered form that can be imbibed or imbued into an object.

ResearchProjectDef.label: scribing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop the knowledge to mix ink with powdered magicyte and apply it through specially design press capable of reproducing scrolls and books that can contain the power of magic comprehension.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced scribing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the use of higher quality material to develop more powerful books and scrolls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: master scribing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the scribing of master spells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arcane crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: The first step in understanding the link between the arcane and physical. Enables construction of powerful gems of insight.

ResearchProjectDef.label: magical equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Applies knowledge of arcane crafting and enchantments to learn how to recreate equipment with magical properties.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arcane artifacts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables the recreation of arcane artifacts through extensive research combining knowledge of enchantments, ancient designs, runes, and rumors.
